Who Am I?

Hey there, I'm Hamad Alhassen and I'd like to welcome you to my website! I'm a front-end web developer that has a passion for basketball, puns, and music. I hope one day to create web and mobile apps that make a positive impact on a user's experience and life. Interested in keeping up with my coding adventures? Check out my Github page. If you'd like to hear more of my basketball ramblings, follow me on Twitter. I do know the MEAN Stack, but I can also offer you a NICE Stack of pancakes!
